snippet: The Ed Sullivan Theater has been transformed for “The Late Show With Stephen Colbert,” bringing it back to something resembling its original 1927 state but with high-tech advances.
abstract: Television program Late Show with Stephen Colbert debuts in newly renovated Ed Sullivan Theater; renovation reveals dome hidden during David Letterman's tenure and restored stained glass perimeter, merging 1920s touches with modern set.
lead_paragraph: The Ed Sullivan Theater has been transformed for “The Late Show With Stephen Colbert,” bringing it back to something resembling its original 1927 state but with high-tech advances.
